title: 78/923/EEC: Council Decision of 19 June 1978 concerning the conclusion of the European Convention for the protection of animals kept for farming purposes
header:
17.11.1978 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 323/12
COUNCIL DECISION
of 19 June 1978
concerning the conclusion of the European Convention for the protection of animals kept for farming purposes
(78/923/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The European Convention for the protection of animals kept for farming purposes is hereby approved on behalf of the European Economic Community.
The text of the Convention is annexed to this Decision.

The President of the Council shall deposit the instrument of approval in accordance with Article 14 of the Convention (9).
When depositing the instrument of approval, the President of the Council shall, in accordance with Article 16 of the Convention, state that the Convention will not apply to Greenland.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 19 June 1978.
For the Council
The President
P. DALSAGER
